entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
